dcc_toggle_desc: Shows or hides the Console Window
menu_consolemod_firstboot_autoexec_comme:
--The contents of this file will be loaded and executed shortly after the game loads.
--You can use this to automatically set aliases or variables for longer term testing or debugging, or for temporarily overriding Console configuration vars.
--You may safely delete this message.
menu_consolemod_cmd_alias_bad_value: Error: Bad value or function. Alias not created.
menu_consolemod_cmd_alias_bad_name: Error: Bad alias name. Alias not created.
dcc_window_startup_message_3: Type /help for a list of commands.
dcc_printbehavior_desc:
Choose what print\() will do.
Changes take place on restart.
dcc_keybind_debughud_desc: Shows or hides the Debug HUD.
dcc_tagunit_desc: Tags the unit you're looking at
dcc_tagposition_aim_desc: Tag the place you're looking at
